land|(n)|đất, vùng đất|Ví dụ:|What should we do with such wide area of land?
pollute|(v)|gây ô nhiễm|Ví dụ:|The pesticides used on many farms are polluting the water supply .
decompose|(v)|phân hủy|Ví dụ:|The body must have been decomposing for several weeks.
balance|(n)|sự cân bằng|Ví dụ:|We need to have a good balance between job and life.
climate change|(n)|thay đổi khí hậu|Ví dụ:|Climate change makes the Earth hotter.
global warming|(n)|sự ấm lên toàn cầu|Ví dụ:|Nowadays, iceberg is a victim of the global warming.
oil slick|(n)|vết dầu loang|Ví dụ:|The accident left a large oil slick on the sea.
ozone layer|(n)|tầng ozon|Ví dụ:|Our ozone layer is destroyed by air pollution.
biodiversity|(n)|đa dạng sinh học|Ví dụ:|Vietnam has been recognized as a nation with high biodiversity.
ecology|(n)|sinh thái học|Ví dụ:|The oil spill caused terrible damage to the fragile ecology of the coast.
water|(n)|nước|Ví dụ:|Water has accounted 3/4 of surface of the Earth.
air|(n)|không khí|Ví dụ:|The higher, the washier air is.
forest|(n)|rừng|Ví dụ:|The children got lost in the forest.
flora|(n)|hệ thực vật|Ví dụ:|As tourism is more developed, people worry about the damage to the flora and fauna of the island.
creature|(n)|sinh vật, loài vật|Ví dụ:|Rainforests are filled with amazing creatures.
insect|(n)|côn trùng|Ví dụ:|Ants, beetles, butterflies, and flies are all insects.
reproduction|(n)|sự sinh sản|Ví dụ:|We are researching reproduction in elephants.
wildlife|(n)|động vật hoang dã|Ví dụ:|Wildlife deserves to receive the protection from human.
sewage|(n)|nước thải|Ví dụ:|Industrial sewage continues to contaminate their beaches.
fauna|(n)|hệ động vật|Ví dụ:|A garden is not a garden without flora and fauna.
